Text: Excellent band from my hometown. Thanks for posting this to get their music out there. Exellent torrent
Thanks for spreading this amazing band.  I've seen them perform and I'm definetly buying their albums!

Dammit! Epitaph is the one song I can't find anywhere! Don't know why it was let go when Plan Your Escape was cut from an LP to an EP (in fact, I don't even get why they made that dumb cut to begin with), but kudos on the rest! Aside from the 2006 to 2008 releases, I didn't even know the rest of this stuff existed!
love this band - if anyone has the dvd-r of the 5.1 audio version of The Galilean Satellites that would be perfect.
